dct_title_s: Galizien (Karpathen), Bukowina nebst anschlie√üendem Ungarn, Russland u.s.w
dct_alternative_sm: Galicia (Carpathia), Bukovina, followed by Hungary, Russia, etc
dct_description_sm: World War 1 map, published in Germany, showing several troop lines (with dates) throughout the Carpathian Mountains.
Gezeichnet v. Hans Ravenstein; Verlag L. Ravenstein, Frankfurt a.M.
Relief shown by shading and spot-heights.
Shows position lines (with dates throughout from 1914 to November 1915), battle locations, forts, settlements of various populations, various roads and paths, railways, waterways, country boundaries.
